synopsis.text: Japanese swords are not just weapons, but protectors of history in the year 2305. The Saniwa, a group of sages, have the unique ability to bring these historical swords to life as handsome young men known as Touken Danshi. As the past is threatened by the 'historical revisionists', the Touken Danshi must rise to the challenge and defend history. Follow the cheerful and lively adventures of Yamatonokami Yasusada, a beloved uchigatana, and his old friend Kashuu Kiyomitsu, as they navigate through their daily lives at the Saniwa's citadel. From snowball fights to welcoming new comrades, these sword warriors never miss an opportunity to have fun, all while being ready to fulfill their mission of protecting history at a moment's notice.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
